Pi Patel (Suraj Sharma) is the son of the owner of a zoo located in Pondicherry, India. After years of taking care of business, the family decides to sell the venture due to the withdrawal of the encouragement given by the local municipality. The idea is to move to Canada, where they could sell the animals to resume life. However, the freighter traveling where everyone ends up sinking because of a terrible storm. Pi can survive in a lifeboat, but need to share the little available space with a zebra, an orangutan, a hyena and a Bengal tiger named Richard Parker.
